text.section: The electronic signature shall satisfy the requirements set forth in KRS 369.101 to 369.120.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 133, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 3, effective June 8, 2011. -- Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 41, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 41, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 183, provides, "The specific textual provisions of Sections 1 to 178 of this Act which reflect amendments made to those sections by 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137 shall be deemed effective as of June 26, 2007, and those provisions are hereby made expressly retroactive to that date, with the remainder of the text of those sections being unaffected by the provisions of this section."
